languages.text: "Меня привезли на Даргонус, когда Теодора была юна, и готовили к роли сенешаля. Став Вольным Торговцем, она отказалась признавать меня родственником: ей нужен был послушный слуга, который не претендовал бы на власть. И веди я себя хорошо, то, может быть, на смертном одре Теодора бы и снизошла бы назвать меня братом и наследником".

"When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."
languages.original_text: "Меня привезли на Даргонус, когда Теодора была юна, и готовили к роли сенешаля. Став Вольным Торговцем, она отказалась признавать меня родственником: ей нужен был послушный слуга, который не претендовал бы на власть. И веди я себя хорошо, то, может быть, на смертном одре Теодора бы и снизошла бы назвать меня братом и наследником".

languages.text: «Cuando Theodora era joven, me llevaron a Dargonus para entrenarme como Senescal. Cuando se convirtió en Comerciante Independiente, se negó a reconocerme como familia. Necesitaba un sirviente obediente que no pudiera desafiar su mandato. De haberme comportado como debía, tal vez Theodora se hubiera dignado a reconocerme como hermano y heredero en su lecho de muerte».
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando Theodora era joven, me llevaron a Dargonus para entrenarme como Senescal. Cuando se convirtió en Comerciante Independiente, se negó a reconocerme como familia. Necesitaba un sirviente obediente que no pudiera desafiar su mandato. De haberme comportado como debía, tal vez Theodora se hubiera dignado a reconocerme como hermano y heredero en su lecho de muerte».

languages.text: “西奥多拉还年轻的时候，我被带到达戈努斯接受训练，担任总领一职。当她继任行商浪人的王位时，她不肯承认我是她的亲人，因为她需要的是听话的仆从，不会对她的统治构成威胁。如果我当初能守点规矩的话，或许西奥多拉在临终前，会屈尊承认我是她的族人，她的哥哥。”
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉还年轻的时候，我被带到达戈努斯接受训练，担任总领一职。当她继任行商浪人的王位时，她不肯承认我是她的亲人，因为她需要的是听话的仆从，不会对她的统治构成威胁。如果我当初能守点规矩的话，或许西奥多拉在临终前，会屈尊承认我是她的族人，她的哥哥。”

languages.text: 「シオドーラが若かったころ、私はダルゴナスに連れて行かれて家令長の役のために訓練を受けた。彼女がローグトレーダーとなったとき、私を親族として認識することを拒否した。彼女は彼女の支配の脅威とならない従順な下部を必要とした。私が行儀良くしていたなら、もしかしたらシオドーラは私のことを兄と呼び、臨終の際に跡を継がせただろう」
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラが若かったころ、私はダルゴナスに連れて行かれて家令長の役のために訓練を受けた。彼女がローグトレーダーとなったとき、私を親族として認識することを拒否した。彼女は彼女の支配の脅威とならない従順な下部を必要とした。私が行儀良くしていたなら、もしかしたらシオドーラは私のことを兄と呼び、臨終の際に跡を継がせただろう」

languages.text: "Als Theodora jung war, sollte ich auf Dargonus zum Truchsess ausgebildet werden. Als sie schließlich Freihändlerin wurde, weigerte sie sich, mich anzuerkennen. Sie brauchte einen gehorsamen Diener, der ihre Herrschaft nicht infrage stellen würde. Hätte ich mich benommen, hätte sie mich auf ihrem Totenbett vielleicht als Bruder legitimiert und zu ihrem Nachfolger ernannt."
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: "Als Theodora jung war, sollte ich auf Dargonus zum Truchsess ausgebildet werden. Als sie schließlich Freihändlerin wurde, weigerte sie sich, mich anzuerkennen. Sie brauchte einen gehorsamen Diener, der ihre Herrschaft nicht infrage stellen würde. Hätte ich mich benommen, hätte sie mich auf ihrem Totenbett vielleicht als Bruder legitimiert und zu ihrem Nachfolger ernannt."

languages.text: « Théodora était encore toute jeune quand on m'a conduit sur Dargonus pour me former au métier de sénéchal. Et lorsqu'elle est devenue libre-marchande à son tour, elle a refusé de révéler au grand jour notre lien de parenté. Elle avait besoin d'un serviteur obéissant qui ne menace pas son autorité. Si j'avais montré patte blanche, peut-être aurait-elle daigné me reconnaître comme son frère et héritier sur son lit de mort. »
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: « Théodora était encore toute jeune quand on m'a conduit sur Dargonus pour me former au métier de sénéchal. Et lorsqu'elle est devenue libre-marchande à son tour, elle a refusé de révéler au grand jour notre lien de parenté. Elle avait besoin d'un serviteur obéissant qui ne menace pas son autorité. Si j'avais montré patte blanche, peut-être aurait-elle daigné me reconnaître comme son frère et héritier sur son lit de mort. »

languages.text: "Theodora küçükken Seneşallik mevkisi için eğitilmek üzere Dargonus'a gönderildim. Hür Tacir olduğunda beni soydaşı olarak tanımayı reddetti. Hükmüne karşı gelmeyecek, itaatkâr bir hizmetkâra ihtiyacı vardı. Uslu dursam belki Theodora, ölüm döşeğine düştüğünde bana ağabeyi ve vârisi demeye tenezzül ederdi."
languages.original_text: "When Theodora was young, I was brought to Dargonus to be trained for the role of Seneschal. When she became the Rogue Trader, she refused to recognise me as her kin. She needed an obedient servant who wouldn't challenge her rule. Had I behaved myself, perhaps Theodora would have condescended to call me her brother and heir on her deathbed."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora küçükken Seneşallik mevkisi için eğitilmek üzere Dargonus'a gönderildim. Hür Tacir olduğunda beni soydaşı olarak tanımayı reddetti. Hükmüne karşı gelmeyecek, itaatkâr bir hizmetkâra ihtiyacı vardı. Uslu dursam belki Theodora, ölüm döşeğine düştüğünde bana ağabeyi ve vârisi demeye tenezzül ederdi."
